concept.title: Expression Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The Expression Evaluator performs calculations with record data. It writes the results of the calculations to new or existing fields in the record.

conbody.p: processorsExpression EvaluatorExpression Evaluator processoroverviewTo create an expression, you define the name of the field to receive the results of the expression and the expression that you want to use. Use the expression language to define the calculations that you want to use.

You can use pipeline constants in any expression in the processor. Define a pipeline constant when you have a constant value that you use in more than one expression or that you want to change easily.
